name: Hippoxxus
storyline:
Hippoxxus is an immersive Sci-fi adventure game that follows the journey of a teenage boy who wakes up in a massive alien spaceship with no past memories.

As the protagonist, you must navigate the creepy halls of this spaceship, piecing together parts of your lost memories while uncovering the disturbing truth about your abduction.

Along the way, you will find unusual lifeforms, and hidden mysteries that will help you discover the dark experiments carried out by the alien species.

Every step closer to the truth will expose the evil forces at work and your role in the bigger mystery, which could decide the fate of both humans and the alien species.
summary:
Hippoxxus is an Action/Adventure Metroidvania where you explore a massive Sci-Fi spaceship while uncovering the truth about the protagonist's forgotten past.

Explore different interconnected rooms: all filled with enemies and traps, which are brought to life with traditional 2D frame-by-frame animation.
